name: Halloween Fall
description:
You know those dreams where you are falling forever? How about the dreams where you are running away from something? Let's combine those two and turn you into a walking and jumping eye ball named Iris! Welcome to Halloween Fall where you try to avoid death for as long as possible!

This is one of my personal favorites that has come from doing these assignments. I love the feel I was able to create with the little time I had to make the assets and the small bit of animation I applied to Iris.

What would take this to the next step is a good dose of particle effects, some parallaxing background images and a spookier color palette to really sell the SPOOK factor!

If you want to see more personal projects in the future make sure you follow!

Best Played Out of Fullscreen

This project is the result of completing an assignment for Game Development I at the University of Central Missouri. Finished Oct. 1st, 2021
